hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9dd0446469fbccf8c17811bef19c14fe.png)

We can take apart $\green{6}$ to make $\pink4$ and $\blue2$.  
We can put together $\pink4$ and $\blue2$ to make $\green{6}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$6-4=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $4=6$
